description: I did not enjoy the application. It is a graphing tool of which I feel was built as a hobby project. I believe they are better alternatives to mapping system variables through time.

It is in the ubuntu selection of programs. Once I installed it on my computer, it did not function as is seen in the website showings. This had a lot of comment about KDE, and I presume that KDE needs to be used instead of ubuntu. Whatever, if it worked on ubuntu, it would be nice to see what programs are working, and maybe who your computer is talking to behind your back by a over active function tabulated.
summary: Installed, but did not function on current version of ubuntu
